entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kindersley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Pellets, -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kindersley Airport 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Ice Pellets
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -10.6°C
Wind: ENE 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets. Freezing rain over southwestern sections early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:23 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:23 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:23 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
